title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/13/17
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/13/17
description:
George Noory and guest David Adair discuss his efforts to protect the power grid of the United States from a nuclear attack or solar flares that would lead to mass destruction and death due to loss of all electrical power.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
